meanings.definition: A group of disinfectants and antiseptics
meanings.sent1: The hospital used chlorhexidines to clean the surgical tools thoroughly.
meanings.sent2: Chlorhexidines are commonly found in mouthwashes for killing germs.
meanings.sent3: The chlorhexidines danced around the room, making sure all surfaces were germ-free.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to keep everything spotless was like chlorhexidines in action.
meanings.sent5: The smell of chlorhexidines filled the air, promising a sterile environment.

meanings.definition: Chemical compounds used for their antimicrobial properties
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying the effectiveness of chlorhexidines in fighting bacteria.
meanings.sent2: It is important to follow the instructions when using chlorhexidines to ensure safety.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria tried to hide, but the chlorhexidines found them and defeated them.
meanings.sent4: The power of chlorhexidines against germs was like a superhero saving the day.
meanings.sent5: The solution of chlorhexidines glowed blue, ready to eliminate any harmful microorganisms.
